EmailTemplate.name: Florida APCO.Invitation (Halloween)
EmailTemplate.subject: Florida APCO - Trick or Treat at TriTech Booth #34
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See You There! Florida APCO / NENA State Conference
Stop by and visit TriTech at the Florida APCO / NENA Conference in Weston, Florida. Visit with Sally and Brett in Booth #34 to learn more about how TriTech's CAD and Mobile solutions are helping our clients reshape the way they manage information.
Enter to Win a Public Safety Monopoly Game at the TriTech Booth #34.
Can't make the conference? Contact us at (858) 799-7900 or email sales@tritech.com to schedule a demonstration.
We look forward to seeing you there!
Sally Olson-Nelson, Client Account Manager sally.olson-nelson@tritech.com
Brett Haley, Regional Sales Manager brett.haley@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
